51bc6581-848c-4aa7-bfbc-566b5b22459d.name: LinkBuds Truly Wireless Earbuds | Gray
features: Link your online and offline worlds with headphones that keep you in both. The all-new Sony LinkBuds feature a comfortable open-ring design that naturally blends ambient sound with digital sound. Stay authentically connected to everyday life while listening to music, taking calls, gaming, and more, all with dynamic sound.
See how LinkBuds keep you connected and in control of your everyday music by combining superior fit, open-ear styling with high call and sound quality.
